titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that income of a child on investments attributable to the child's earned income shall not be taxed at the parents' rate of tax.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/11/1988--Introduced. Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions governing situations in which unearned income of a child under age 14 is taxed as if it were parental income. Excludes from income subject to the parental tax rate any earnings attributable to investments of the child's earned income.
